attributes.action: A People's Vote must include 'Revoke Article 50 and remain in the EU'
attributes.additional_details:
Months ago, the Petition to Revoke A50 passed 6 million signatures within a few days http://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584 There is much support for a People's Vote.

Labour, LibDems, SNP, ChangeUK now support a referendum. DUP prop up the Tories despite NI voting to Remain in 2016 - the ONLY guarantee to avoid a "hard border" and the likely break-up of the UK is to remain in the EU.

The only sovereign decision left to the UK is to Revoke Article 50 and reconsider what to do.
attributes.background:
More and more Parliament Parties now support "going back to the People" about leaving the EU. Voters are now well informed about Brexit.

The only sovereign decision left to the UK is to Revoke Article 50 and reconsider what to do.Many want to exercise their democratic choice - so sign now.
